articles.title: TikTok and Universal settle dispute over music royalties - BBC.com
articles.description: The deal means songs from artists including Ariana Grande and Drake can be used on the platform again.

articles.title: Local elections 2024: Voting under way in England and Wales - BBC.com
articles.description: Voters can cast their ballots for local councillors, mayors and police and crime commissioners.

articles.title: Apple trying to fix iPhone's alarming problem - Sky News
articles.content:
Apple is trying to fix a problem which caused some iPhone alarms to not go off.
Users have been complaining they were missing their alarms.
"This has probably been the third or fourth day in a row … [+1453 chars]

articles.title: NASA on Alert: Scientists Gear Up for Solar Storms at Mars - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Sun will be at peak activity this year, providing a rare opportunity to study how solar storms and radiation could affect future astronauts on the Red Planet. In the months ahead, two of NASA’s Mars spacecraft will have an unprecedented opportunity to stu…
articles.content: This coronal mass ejection, captured by NASA’s Solar Dynamics Observatory, erupted on the Sun on August 31, 2012, traveling over 900 miles per second and sending radiation deep into space. Earth’s ma… [+6747 chars]
